mapper.select:
select
distinct
,CONCAT(AREA_ID,'_',REG_ID,'_',DEPT_ID,'_',GR_ID,'_',USER_ID) as RANGE from FUN_ATTENDANCE_STATISTICS
order by ${orderByClause}

select distinct USER_ID from FUN_ATTENDANCE_STATISTICS
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
,CONCAT(AREA_ID,'_',REG_ID,'_',DEPT_ID,'_',GR_ID,'_',USER_ID) as RANGE from FUN_ATTENDANCE_STATISTICS
order by ${orderByClause}
select max(ATT_SUM_COUNT) from FUN_ATTENDANCE_STATISTICS WHERE COMP_ID = #{compId} AND ATT_DATE >= #{attDateStart} AND ATT_DATE <= #{attDateEnd} AND ATT_ClASS_ID>0
